web_snippets: Lee Strobel, the former award-winning legal editor of The Chicago Tribune, is a New York Times best-selling author of more than 40 books and curricula.
Atheist-turned-Christian Lee Strobel is the former award-winning legal editor of The Chicago Tribune and best-selling author of more than twenty books.
Lee Strobel is the Founding Director of the Lee Strobel Center for Evangelism and Applied Apologetics at Colorado Christian University, and a teaching pastor ...
